page.title: 11Family Life
page.content: Families have a stable homelife. We have{virtually no unemployment, divorce is uncommon. Houses are privately owned and have gardens. There are 18 children under 16 years. Our interests are centred around farming, animals, countryside and activities in the Village Hall. Generally, meals are wholesome- fruit & vegetables being home grown & meat is locally produced.{Some farmers kill {pigs & lambs for home consumption.}We eat puddings & home made cakes. Retired & young couples have come from 'other parts' to live in Hyssing- ton some don't adjust to village life and quickly move. Our fear is rural depopulation. Many cottages in the Todleth area are{weekend/holiday homes and families aren't resident long enough to become an integral part of the Community.
